passages.text:
This is it. The front gates to the Lair of the Evil Death Man Nonprofit Organization. It is your job to confront the Evil Death Man herself.
In your bag is a cane you acquired from an old man, a USB mouse you were given from a spooky skeleton, and an empty bucket. You used to have a magic ice cube but it melted.%give:CANE;%give:MOUSE;%give:BUCKET;
What do you do?

[[Kick open the door, being as loud as possible->Kick open the door]]
[[Carefully peek in the door]]
[[Whack with cane]]
[[Plug in mouse->Outside Plug in mouse 1]]
[[Wear bucket]]

links.name: Kick open the door, being as loud as possible

passages.name: Front Gates

passages.text:
You kick open the door!

Inside is a carefully balanced tower of chairs, and a person standing next to it. The person is startled by your entrance. The person is presumably the one who built the tower of chairs. The elevator is at the other end of the room.

It looks like you have a few moments while the Chair Tower Maker is stunned.

[[Run past him into the elevator->Elevator]]
[[Destroy the tower of chairs]]
[[%prohibit:BUCKETHEAD;Fight the Chair Tower Maker->Fight the Chair Tower Maker]]
[[%need:BUCKETHEAD;Fight the Chair Tower Maker->Fight the Chair Tower Maker Armor]]
[[Wait->Room 1 Kick Wait]]

links.name: Run past him into the elevator
%need:BUCKETHEAD;Fight the Chair Tower Maker
links.link: Fight the Chair Tower Maker Armor

passages.name: Kick open the door

passages.text:
You open the door a teensy bit, and take a peek inside.

There is a tower of chairs, and a person right next to it. The person is grabbing another chair to add to the tower. At the other end of the room is an elevator to the rest of the evil lair.

[[Sneak past]]
[[Throw a rock]]
[[Talk->Room 1 Talk]]
passages.name: Carefully peek in the door

passages.text:
You whack the door with your cane.

A few moments later, a person opens the door.
"Hello?"

[["Hi, I'm selling this here cane"->"Hi, I'm selling this here"]]
[["Hi, I'm selling this here mouse"->"Hi, I'm selling this here"]]
[[%need:BUCKET;"Hi, I'm selling this here bucket"->"Hi, I'm selling this here"]]
[["Hi, I'm selling my bones"]]
[["Hi, I'm here to confront the Evil Death Man"]]

links.name: "Hi, I'm here to confront the Evil Death Man"
links.link: "Hi, I'm here to confront the Evil Death Man"

passages.name: Whack with cane

passages.text:
You try to plug the mouse into the door.

???

[[Kick open the door, being as loud as possible->Kick open the door]]
[[Carefully peek in the door]]
[[Whack with cane]]
[[Plug in mouse->Outside Plug in mouse 2]]
[[%need:BUCKET;Wear bucket->Wear bucket]]

links.name: Kick open the door, being as loud as possible

passages.name: Outside Plug in mouse 1

passages.text:
You put on your stylish headwear. %remove:BUCKET;%give:BUCKETHEAD;

[[Kick open the door, being as loud as possible->Kick open the door]]
[[Carefully peek in the door]]
[[Whack with cane]]
[[Plug in mouse->Outside Plug in mouse 1]]

links.name: Kick open the door, being as loud as possible

passages.name: Wear bucket

passages.text:
You knock over the tower of chairs! It crashes into the ground.
The Chair Tower Maker is not pleased.
The Chair Tower Maker begins screaming, bawling, making sounds that aren't even words at the absolute top of his lungs.
He charges at you.
There is nothing you can do.
You are bashed and punched into a pulp.
You are dead.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Destroy the tower of chairs

passages.text:
You charge at the Chair Tower Maker, but he realizes what's happening and grabs a chair. 
He hits you with the chair a bunch.

...

You wake up in a hospital bed. You look down at your body to see that your body is now very elderly. A doctor comes in after a few minutes. As soon as they see you, they get excited.
"Oh my goodness! You're awake!"
"How... how long-"
"You've been in a coma for 75 years!"
You then die from old age.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Fight the Chair Tower Maker

passages.text:
"Can I... help you?" the Chair Tower Maker says.

[["Hello, I would like to pass"]]
[["You smell like month-old rotting cheese"]]
[["Nice tower of chairs"]]
[["Nice shirt"]]
[["Nice weather"]]
passages.name: Room 1 Kick Wait

passages.text:
You hide behind various chairs in the room.
Just as you're about to reach the elevator, the Chair Tower Maker spots you, gets really startled, and bumps the tower of chairs.
The tower of chairs falls over and crushes you.
The last thing you hear is the unearthly wail of the Chair Tower Maker.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Sneak past

passages.text:
You throw a rock to distract the Chair Tower Maker, but you didn't pay much attention to where you were throwing it.

Oh no.

The Chair Tower Maker just straight-up kills you.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Throw a rock

passages.text:
You approach the Chair Tower Maker.

[["Hello, I would like to pass"]]
[["You smell like month-old rotting cheese"]]
[["Nice tower of chairs"]]
[["Nice shirt"]]
[["Nice weather"]]
passages.name: Room 1 Talk

passages.text:
"Hi, I'm selling this here-"
"No thanks."
The person closes the door. They lock it. Now what are you going to do?

You go home and enjoy a bowl of noodles.
Maybe someone else will confront the Evil Death Man.

THE END
passages.name: "Hi, I'm selling this here"

passages.text:
"Hi, I'm selling my bones."

The person doesn't know what to say.

[[Walk in->Room 1 Bone Seller]]
[[Sell them your bones]]
passages.name: "Hi, I'm selling my bones"

passages.text:
"Oh, sure. Come right on in."
You come right on in.
In the middle of the room is a tower of carefully balanced chairs. You guess that the person was the one who built it.
"Do you have an appointment?" the Chair Tower Maker says.

[[Yes->Room 1 I have an appointment]]
[[No->Room 1 I do not have an appointment]]

links.name: No
links.link: Room 1 I do not have an appointment

passages.name: "Hi, I'm here to confront the Evil Death Man"

passages.text:
You try to plug the mouse into the door... again.

Y'know what?

I'm gonna confiscate that mouse. That's right no more mouse for you. Rest of the entire game.

[[Kick open the door, being as loud as possible->Kick open the door]]
[[Carefully peek in the door]]
[[Whack with cane]]
[[%need:BUCKET;Wear bucket->Wear bucket]]

links.name: Kick open the door, being as loud as possible

passages.name: Outside Plug in mouse 2

passages.text:
You walk into the room.
There's a tower of chairs in the middle of it. At the other end of the room is an elevator.
You look back at the person. They're still wigged out.
You use this as an opportunity to go to the elevator.

[[Next->Elevator]]
passages.name: Room 1 Bone Seller

passages.text:
You sell them your bones. One one hand, you are dead. On the other hand... 3,500 bucks is 3,500 bucks.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Sell them your bones

passages.text:
"Yes," you say.
"Cool. Just step in that elevator and head up a bit."

[["Thanks."->Elevator]]
passages.name: Room 1 I have an appointment

passages.text:
"No," you say.
"That's probably fine. You might have to wait a bit to see her. Just go in the elevator and go up a bit."

[["Thanks."->Elevator]]
passages.name: Room 1 I do not have an appointment

passages.text:
"Okay." He lets you pass.

[[Enter the elevator->Elevator]]
passages.name: "Hello, I would like to pass"

passages.text:
"Do I really smell that bad?" The Chair Tower Maker smells himself. "That was really rude."

[[Go to the elevator->Elevator]]
[["Your teeth are bad. Not in appearance, but like, morally"]]

links.name: "Your teeth are bad. Not in appearance, but like, morally"
links.link: "Your teeth are bad. Not in appearance, but like, morally"

passages.name: "You smell like month-old rotting cheese"

passages.text:
"Thanks! This is the highest I've ever gotten it, and I am extremely proud of it."
The two of you carry on a friendly conversation.
"Well, good luck with your tower of chairs!"
"Thank you! Good luck on confronting the Evil Death Man! Just go up a bit."

[[Next->Elevator]]
passages.name: "Nice tower of chairs"

passages.text:
The Chair Tower Maker looks confused. "I'm not wearing a shirt."
You are confused. He is clearly wearing a shirt.

[[Leave->Elevator]]
[[...->Room 1 shirts]]
passages.name: "Nice shirt"

passages.text:
"Thanks! I made it myself."

[[Next->Elevator]]
passages.name: "Nice weather"

passages.text:
You are in the elavator.

There are two buttons. Which do you press?

[[A little bit up]]
[[A whole lot up]]
passages.name: Elevator

passages.text:
"Aauuugh! Why did you have to say that! Now I'm going to be self-conscious about my teeth's maliciousness every time I smile!"

[[Go to the elevator->Elevator]]
[["Your tower of chairs is cruddy"]]
passages.name: "Your teeth are bad. Not in appearance, but like, morally"

passages.text:
You are dead.

GAME OVER
passages.name: "Your tower of chairs is cruddy"

passages.text:
uh...

Suddenly, the ceiling crumbles and crushes the both of you!

GAME OVER
passages.name: Room 1 shirts

passages.text:
The elevator begins moving up. About two seconds pass before it stops.
The back of the elevator opens to another room. The room is fairly spacious, dimly lit, and fairly clean. The walls are made from a very deep, dark wood. The floor is a white tile. There are cabinets, filing cabinets, and drawers around the edges of the room. In the very middle is a massive desk, with a nameplate "Evil Death Man" resting neatly on the edge. Behind the desk is a leather chair, facing away from you.

The leather chair spins around, and, on it, the Evil Death Man glares at you. Her gaze is almost enough to make your legs give way beneath you.

[[Confront the Evil Death Man]]
passages.name: A little bit up

passages.text:
The elevator begins accelerating upwards. You feel pressed into the ground more and more. You didn't realize just how high up this button brought you. Eventually, you're unable to stand, and crash onto the floor.

After a few minutes, the elevator finally starts decelerating. How high did you go? You're terrified to find out.

The doors slide open. Outside is a huge green room. As you take a step into it, your foot sinks a little bit. The entire room is covered in moss. There is a door at the other end of the room, but the door is raised 5 meters off the ground.

Dangling above you is a key suspended by a rope. The key is just out of reach. To your right is a machine labeled "The Homonymifier." Next to it is a ribbon, and a sign with an arrow pointing at the door.

passages.name: Swing mouse at door

passages.text:
You throw the ribbon at the door! The ribbon is very hard to throw like rope since it's so light. The air resistance makes it stop moving, and it floats back down to you. It's okay, the ribbon didn't look long enough anyway.

passages.name: Pick up sign

passages.text:
You throw the rope at the door! The end of the rope flies into the doorway! Yes! You excitedly try climbing the rope, but there's nothing to anchor it at the other end, and the rope just slides back out of the doorframe. From the looks of it, the bottom of the doorframe isn't actually flush with the floor behind it, making a sizeable board that the rope dissappeared behind. Maybe that was put there so wheeled carts wouldn't go carreening out of the doorway.

passages.name: Throw rope at door

passages.text:
You throw the rope-mouse combo at the door! The mouse gets stuck behind the doorframe, locking it in place. Are you ready to leave?

[[Yes->Ladder]]
[[No->Moss Room]]
passages.name: Throw the rope tied to the mouse at the door

passages.text:
You go back in the elevator, and go down. The elevator begins accelerating downwards. You feel yourself getting lighter and lighter. Eventually your feet leave the ground, and you are brought to the ceiling of the room.

A few minutes pass and the elevator begins decellerating. You feel yourself becoming lighter in terms of anti-gravity, then weightless again, and back on the floor. The elevator finally returns to a stop.

A light turns on in the panel of buttons. The elevator is stuck. Oh no. How long will it be stuck for? There isn't an emergency button.

...

You rot.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Go back in the elevator and head back down

passages.text:
You rot.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Rot

passages.text:
You put the chair beneath the key, and then stand on the chair. You can now reach the key! You grab the key.%give:KEY;

passages.name: Jump at key while standing on chair

passages.text:
You set the chair beneath the rope, and stand on it in order to reach the rope. You grab onto the rope! You climb up to the top of the room, but it doesn't look like there's a knot to untie. The rope just goes into the ceiling. Also, if there were a knot you could untie, you would fall quite a distance if you did. Maybe the moss would cushion your fall. Maybe you'd smash your head into the chair.
You slide back down the rope.

passages.name: Pick up the chair again

passages.text:
You pick up the mouse and everything it's attached to, and put them all in your bag.

This room is very small. It's almost like a hallway, except it's length is very short. It's about the size of 3 closets. In the back of the room is a ladder going up.

[[Climb up the ladder->Evil Death Man Room Ladder]]
passages.name: Ladder

passages.text:
What would you like to do?

passages.name: Moss Room

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Insert USB mouse

passages.text:
The mouse tries to squirm out of your hands, but you manage to put it back in The Homonymifier. The mouse gets turned back into a USB mouse.%remove:RODENT_MOUSE;%give:MOUSE;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Shove in the rodent mouse

passages.text:
This cane has been with you for a very long time, it's almost a shame that it's about to be transformed. You gently place the cane into The Homonymifier, and watch as it gets transformed into sugar cane.%remove:CANE;%give:SUGAR_CANE;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Put in cane

passages.text:
You put in the sugar cane, and your cane is returned to you. But will it ever really be the same?%remove:SUGAR_CANE;%give:CANE;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Put in sugar cane

passages.text:
You place the ribbon on the conveyor belt, but the ribbon comes out the other side unchanged.

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Place the ribbon in it

passages.text:
You use The Homonymifier on the ribbon tied into a bow, and the machine spits out a twangy shoot-stuff bow!%remove:RIBBON_BOW;%give:BOW;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Use it on the ribbon tied into a bow

passages.text:
You squeeze the bow into the machine. The bow turns back into the ribbon tied into a bow.%remove:BOW;%give:RIBBON_BOW;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Squeeze the bow into it
Insert the sign

passages.text:
You put the arrow back into The Homonymifier. It gives you the sign again.%give:SIGN;%remove:ARROW;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Put in arrow

passages.text:
You shove the chair into The Homonymifier. It gives you back a chair.
How productive.

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Shove in the chair

passages.text:
You put in the bucket, but it doesn't do anything with it. The bucket ends up unchanged in the output spot.

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Feed it the bucket

passages.text:
You tie the ribbon into a bow! It looks really cute.%remove:RIBBON;%give:RIBBON_BOW;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Tie the ribbon into a bow

passages.text:
You put the rope in, but The Homonymifier doesn't do anything to it.

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Put in rope

passages.text:
You put the key in it. The Homonymifier transforms it into the "8" key from a keyboard. I really don't like the 8 key, you should probably turn it back into a key immediately.%remove:KEY;%give:8_KEY;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Put the key in it

passages.text:
You put in the 8 key, and the lock-opening key comes back out.%remove:8_KEY;%give:KEY;

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Put in the 8 key

passages.text:
What are you doing? This is not part of the game. Please stop pressing the 8 key and get back to confronting the Evil Death Man.

[[Next->Go to The Homonymifier]]
passages.name: Press the 8 key

passages.text:
You climb up the ladder to find yourself in a fairly spacious room. The walls are made of a deep wood, and the floor of white tile. Cabinets, drawers, and tables line the edges of the room. In the middle of the room is a desk with a nameplate reading "Evil Death Man" on it.

Wait, what? How did you end up in the Evil Death Man's room? You look out the window. You're pretty much at ground level. How did you end up here while only ever going upwards?

The leather chair spins around to reveal the Evil Death Man glaring at you, but you're too confused to be afraid of her right now.

[[Confront the Evil Death Man->Confront the Evil Death Man Ladder]]

links.name: Confront the Evil Death Man
links.link: Confront the Evil Death Man Ladder

passages.name: Evil Death Man Room Ladder

passages.text:
"Hello, Evil Death Man. I've got some concerns I would like to talk with you about."

"Of course," the Evil Death Man says, "Have a seat." A chair materializes across from her. You get in the seat.

[[Express your concerns]]
passages.name: Confront the Evil Death Man

passages.text:
"I'm a health worker from City Hall, and I'm here to inform you that the Lair of the Evil Death Man Nonprofit Organization is violating a bunch of health and safety regulations." You produce a bunch of papers from your bag.
"No." The Evil Death Man says.
"What?"
"No." She repeats. She then presses a button on her desk. A huge door opens in the wall, and a giant furry blobbish monster wiggles out.
"This guy really likes sugar, and there's quite a lot in the human body," the Evil Death Man says as her chair descends into the floor.
"WHAT"

The monster eats you. Oh no.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Express your concerns

passages.text:
"I'm a health worker from City Hall, and I'm here to inform you that the Lair of the Evil Death Man Nonprofit Organization is violating a bunch of health and safety regulations." You produce a bunch of papers from your bag.
"No," says the Evil Death Man.
"What?"
"No," she repeats. She then presses a button on her desk. A huge door opens in the wall, and a giant furry blobbish monster wiggles out.
"This guy really likes sugar, and there's quite a lot in the human body," the Evil Death Man says as her chair descends into the floor.

[[%need:SUGAR_CANE;Toss the sugar cane to the monster!]]
[[Freak out]]

links.name: %need:SUGAR_CANE;Toss the sugar cane to the monster!
links.link: %need:SUGAR_CANE;Toss the sugar cane to the monster!

passages.name: Express Your Concerns Ladder

passages.text:
"...Hello, Evil Death Man. I've got some concerns I would like to talk with you about."

"Of course," the Evil Death Man says, "Have a seat." A chair materializes across from her. You get in the seat.

[[Express Your Concerns->Express Your Concerns Ladder]]
passages.name: Confront the Evil Death Man Ladder

passages.text:
You toss the sugar cane to the monster. You quickly snag the regulation papers off the desk, and hop down the hole the Evil Death Man descended down to before it closes.

You and the Evil Death Man are now both in a barren room. They are trapped in here with you.

You begin reading off all of the health and safety violations to her.

"For one, the building is so tall that it violates airspace regulations AND it permeates low-earth-orbit, so it's at risk of collision with a satellite."

"Another thing, and I saw this myself while I was in the elevator, your elevators don't have an emegency button! In fact, they don't even have DOOR OPEN or DOOR CLOSE."

"Thirdly, we have recieved reports that your bathroom is not handicap accessible."

Eventually, you make it through your whole spiel, and your job is done. You leave the premises of the Lair of the Evil Death Man Nonprofit Organization, and go home to enjoy some well-earned noodles.

YOU WIN
passages.name: %need:SUGAR_CANE;Toss the sugar cane to the monster!

passages.text:
You begin freaking out, and the monster eats you.

GAME OVER
passages.name: Freak out
